# Contributing

Thanks for helping improve Immaculaterr.

## Quick notes

- Please open issues for bugs and feature requests (templates will guide you).
- The project uses a `develop` → `master` flow. Changes should land in `develop` first.
- Keep PRs focused and small when possible.

## Development setup

See: [`../doc/setupguide.md`](https://github.com/ohmzi/Immaculaterr/blob/develop/doc/setupguide.md)

## Pull requests

- Describe the “why” and the “what”.
- Include screenshots for UI changes.
- Mention how you tested (Docker, local dev, etc.).

## Reporting security issues

Preferred: [`../doc/security`](https://github.com/ohmzi/Immaculaterr/blob/develop/doc/security.md)

Fallback: [`forum`](https://forms.gle/wMpsDu9jPEY14dua6)
